name: SupeBoss
description:
Created this small game for the trijam. Hope you like it. Support me here if you can.
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bluethunder3991
Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv5p8Wj_OxzEzJj7uZQ8ZcQ

Instructions:
WASD to move.
Space to Jump.
Click to Shoot.

I have attached a file containing all the sprites used in this game, check them out if you wish.

Music downloaded from:
